required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Laser and Therapeutic Ultrasound in the Management of the Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Laser and and Ultrasound Effect on Pain and Disability in Women With Chronic Non-specific Low Back Pain: a Randomized Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

clinical_study.source: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is evaluate the laser and ultrasound effect on pain and disability in women with non-specific chronic low back pain.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Caregiver, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: The pain will be evaluate before and after 25 days of the treatment
primary_outcome.description: The visual analogic scale will be used for evaluate the pain.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: The disability will be evaluate before and after 25 days of the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The Roland Morris questionaire will be used to evaluate the disability.

other_outcome.time_frame: The multidimensional evaluation of pain will be realized before and after 25 days of the treatment
other_outcome.description: The McGill questionaire will be used for the evaluation.

arm_group.description: the group will be treated with 1,5 W/cm² 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine
the group will be treated with 1,5 W/cm² 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine
the group will be treated with 3J during 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine
group of women no treated, only evaluated in two moments and this group will be compared with orthers: laser, pulsed ultrasound and continuous ultrasound.

intervention.description: the group will be treated with 1,5 W/cm² 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine
the group will be treated with 1,5 W/cm² 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine
the group will be treated with 3 J 6 minutes in each side of the lumbar spine in 6 points around the lumbar spine

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- non-specific chronic low back pain
- moderate pain
- eutrophics women
Exclusion Criteria:
- disk herniation
- cardiac diseases
- psychiatrics diseases
- endocrinous diseases
- fractures of the spine
- fractures of lower members
- diabetics
- dental emergency
- local infections
- local non sensibility
- analgesics and anti-inflammatories in use
- neurologic diseases
- pregnancy

overall_contact.last_name: ANA PAULA F A RUBIRA, Ms

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: University of Sao Paulo General Hospital
